refnamediv.refpurpose: Sends a frate signal (fsig) out from an instrument to a named port.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Sends a frate signal (fsig) out from an instrument to a named port.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: Sname -- String name of the outlet port. The name of the outlet is implicitly qualified by the instrument name or number, so it is valid to use the same outlet name in more than one instrument (but not to use the same outlet name twice in one instrument).

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: During performance, the output signal is sent to each instance of an instrument containing an inlet port to which this outlet has been connected using the connect opcode. The signals of all the outlets connected to an inlet are combined in the inlet.
